mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (user_id, pay_amount, pay_date, pay_content) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{pay_amount}, now(), #{pay_content} )
mapper.select: select user_id, pay_date, pay_amount, pay_content, '결제' AS pay_type FROM payment WHERE user_id = #{user_id} UNION ALL SELECT user_id, spon_date AS 'pay_date', spon_money AS 'pay_amount', spon_content AS 'pay_content', '후원' AS pay_type FROM sponsor WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY pay_date desc LIMIT 5
SELECT pay_no FROM payment ORDER BY pay_no DESC LIMIT 1;
